item.title: Automation Balance
item.description: I listend to this podcast with the GLG presiden–Alexander Saint-Amand and Kara Swisher. In this podcast, they discuss the future of education. My takeaway from the discussion is that value is found between the balance of automating and the wisdom of humans. I loved the disucssion that centered around that people can be great teachers for different students. The controversy around YouTube and advertisements on Infowars seems to be another case in point where turning your self completely to automation seems risky.
